Package com.arbergashi.charts.render

package com.arbergashi.charts.render
Rendering layer for ArberCharts.

Contains renderer implementations organized by domain (financial, medical, statistical, circular, specialized, standard). Renderers are designed for zero-allocation execution and should honor PlotContext clipping and scaling contracts.

Thread-safety: Renderers may be reused across frames and must avoid shared mutable state unless explicitly documented. Per-instance caches should remain thread-confined.

Since:
2026-01-30
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi

    Description
    AbstractSpatialLayer
    Base class for spatial-aware layers using batch mapping and projection.
    BaseRenderer
    Base class for all chart renderers, providing common functionality and utility methods.
    ChartRenderer
    Defines the contract for custom chart renderers.
    LayerBand
    Render band for a layer.
    SpatialChunkRenderer
    Marker interface for renderers that can consume spatial chunks directly.
    TooltipContentProvider
    Zero-allocation tooltip content provider.
    TooltipContext
    Tooltip payload for renderer-provided content.
